bridge-type.label: LOQED Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents a LOQED Bridge on your local network. LOQED Locks have to be paired via Bluetooth with it.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: The IP address of the LOQED Bridge. Look it up on your router. It is recommended to set a static IP address lease for the LOQED Bridge (and for your openHAB server too) on your router.

parameter.name: key
parameter.label: Key
parameter.description: This is the Key of app.loqed.com/API-Config

parameter.name: apiToken
parameter.label: API Token
parameter.description: This is the ApiToken of app.loqed.com/API-Config
